Title: Ekadanta
Overview: Ekadhantha revolves around a couple and they don't have child.

Title: Milana
Overview: Hero is in love with a girl who is forced to marry a police officer. Hero is later forced by his parents to marry a girl liked by them. Here starts the trouble again, even she wants a divorce from him. Will hero divorce her or they are happy with each other is the later part of the story

Title: krishna
Overview: A modern revision of the age-old Krishna-Rukmini-Satyabhama epic love story.

Title: Aa Dinagalu
Overview: Chetan loves Mallika but his father hires an underworld don, Kotwal, to break their relationship. Irked by his father's actions, Chetan approaches Kotwal's rival, Jayaraj, to defeat him.

Title: Soundarya
Overview: Soundarya film is the upper middle class family story who is an industrialist, his wife and daughter are dragged in the mafia land dealings.But he want to lead a peaceful life.mafia threaten the life.Finally, he involves in a criminal action innocently.

Title: Arasu
Overview: Shivaraj falls in love with his manager's daughter, Shruthi. However, she refuses his proposal and challenges him to first earn Rs 5000 without using any influence. Shruthi makes Shivaraj a better person, and they both fall in love. But Shruthi finds out that her best friend Aishwarya is also in love with Shivaraj so she gives up her love for her best friend. Later when Aishwarya learns about SHruthi too being in love with him, she feels guilty and backs off the relationship. Instead, Shivaraj comes up with a mind baffling situation and he sets up both the girls with two of his friends and he finds another girl for himself.

Title: Hudugaata
Overview: On a journey to Kanyakumari to interview a sports personality, reporter Balu Mahendar meets a wealthy girl who's in dire need of some help.

Title: #73, Shantinivasa
Overview: When Raghu enters a dysfunctional family as a cook, he clears their misunderstandings and brings the members closer to each other. However, there is more to him than what he shows.

Title: Ee Bandhana
Overview: Remake of  Hindi film Bhagban(2003), which itself is an unofficial adaptation of Make Way for Tomorrow (1937). An old couple sacrifices everything so their children live a happy life. However, they are forced to separate and subjected to ill-treatment and disrespect in their children's homes.

Title: Cheluvina Chittara
Overview: A young schoolgirl, Aishwarya, from a rich local don family falls in love and elopes with a small-time mechanic, Maadesha.

Title: Santa
Overview: Santa is a 2007 Kannada film directed by S. Muralimohan and produced by Vijayakumar and K. P. Srikanth. The film stars Shivaraj Kumar, Aarti Chhabria and Sangliana in lead roles. Music was composed by Gurukiran.

Title: Sathyavan Savithri
Overview: Sathyavan Savithri is a 2007 Kannada film directed by Ramesh Aravind and produced by Ajay Chandani. The film stars Ramesh Aravind, Jennifer Kotwal, Mohan Shankar, and Aniruddh in lead roles. Gurukiran composed the Music.  Sathyavan, a dentist, flirts with women and does not believe in marriage. But when his grandfather decides to donate their ancestral property, Sathyavan reconsiders his decision to get married.

Title: Lava Kusha
Overview: Lava Kusha is a 2007 Kannada film directed by Om Saiprakash. The film stars Upendra, Shivaraj Kumar, Charmi Kaur and Jennifer Kotwal in lead roles. Music was composed by Gurukiran.
